answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Test for diabetes, hypothyroidism, and causes of increased sweating to find out why you have this smell. If no cause is found, then it can only be phantom smell where you perceive the smell when it is not there.Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral. Take care!

question: why do i smell sour milk on my fingers and in the air after rubbing my right cheek hard with my fingertips?  this has very recent and confusing.
title: smell sour milk
